Array.Value: Rabbit
A peaceful yet fast animal. Beware of the white one.
Honey bee
A sweetly hovering bumble bee. It stings when attacked.
Bat
A minion of the night sky. Some say it has secret power.
Silkworm
A rare worm making thread. Hard to be seen, hard to grow.
Anglerfish
An aggressive fish in water. Run if you see a light in deep.
Spider Hatchling
Newly born hatchling of a gigantic spider. Just got hatched but has size of full grown spiders.
Armadillo
An animal rolls around. It rolls quickly, so be careful.
Frog
A tiny frog hopping around. Seemingly harmless, but none knows when touched.
Scorpion
A silent assassin hiding in the desert sands. Beware not to be charmed with it's beauty.
Spider
A well trained trap hunter. Looks kinda gross but surprisingly cute sometimes.
Jewel Scarab
Scarab with crystallized back plate. As it looks, it is hard as crystals.
Hermit Crab
A shy animal with shell of conch on its back. Beware of it's strong claws.
Snail
Gentle animal with cute round house. Not very dangerous with its slow motion.
Fish
A tasty fish which lives in all waters. Yes, a perfect protein supplier!
Flamone
A mysterious and cute creature living in the deep underground. Be careful, touching it might cause endless burning.
Carnivorous Beetle
A beetle that attacks any intruder on sight. It's very ferocious, so run away at all costs.
Mysterious Beetle
A beetle with a shimmering color. Let's touch it.
